name: s86_the_most_useless_inventions_2-0-main
description: **"The Most Useless Inventions Ever"** is a web-based platform that showcases some of the most bizarre, impractical, and hilariously pointless inventions ever created. The goal is to entertain users with ridiculous innovations that make you question, *"Why does this even exist?"* Users can browse, upvote the most absurd inventions, and even submit their own weird discoveries.
